downloadTitle: Windows 10 IoT Core for Raspberry Pi 2 / 3
downloadDescription: This is the core OS image that powers Windows IoT platform on Raspberry Pi 2 & 3. Windows 10 IoT Core is the smallest version of the Windows 10 editions that leverages the Windows 10 common core architecture. This edition enables building low-cost devices with fewer resources.
detailsSection: This is the core OS image that powers Windows IoT platform on Raspberry Pi 2 / 3. Windows 10 IoT Core is the smallest version of the Windows 10 editions that leverages the Windows 10 common core architecture. This edition enables building low-cost devices with fewer resources. Development for Windows 10 IoT Core leverages the Universal Windows Platform. Learn more about Windows 10 IoT Core here.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save to save this program to disk.
  3. Follow the rest of the instructions on the Setup Raspberry Pi page.
